title: Westcott 16935 8-Inch Heavy-Duty Lefty Carbo-Titanium Scissors For Office and Home, Straight (16935)
description: Westcott scissors are stronger, and sharper than other home or office shears. Durable enough for any cutting job, these crafting scissors feature high-performance CarboTitanium-bonded blades that resist corrosion. These scissors are ideal for cutting paper, cardboard, fabric, and other materials. Creating your next masterpiece is easy when you have the very best tools to work with. Westcott, the leader in cutting technology, brings you a coordinated assortment of all the essential tools you need to bring your ideas to life.
